channel.title: Dictionary.com Word of the Day
channel.description: A new word is presented every day with its definition and example sentences from actual published works.

image.title: Dictionary.com
image.description: Free online dictionary, thesaurus and reference guide, crossword puzzles and other word games, online translator and Word of the Day.

item.title: crabwise: Dictionary.com Word of the Day
item.description: crabwise: sideways; also, in a cautiously indirect manner.
